name: RTCPeerConnection.getSenders
description: The RTCPeerConnection method getSenders() returns an array of RTCRtpSender objects, each of which represents the RTP sender responsible for transmitting one track's data.

refs.name: WebRTC 1.0: Real-time Communication Between Browsers
